website_summaries.verdict: Many cats respond better to dog probiotics, so owners can use this product for either type of pet. We recommend mixing powder with fish or coconut oil to disguise flavor.
pros: Safe for both cats and dogs
Each capsule contains 10 billion beneficial bacteria – more than many other brands
cons: Can trigger diarrhea in some pets
Reports of capsules hardening over time

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 6 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 6 stars if I could. My dog has immune system issues and bad allergies and has suffered for years. We have tried so many things, including other probiotics. Someone recommended this brand so we said why not. Well after 5 days she was running around with energy I hadn't seen in years! (She is nearly 14) I'm so happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: I love it and Dog loves
customer_reviews.text: My dogs do really well on Probiotics for several issues such as allergies. One had an infection had made sure he got his probiotics. I do want to mention to pet owners giving probiotics after meals makes it more bio-avaible for the body to use. You ask how to give a capsule...squirt 1/4 teaspoon of fish oil or coconut in a teaspoon. Open the capsule and and sprinkle on top and feed!!!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: I swear by these probiotics!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a cat from the shelter that came home with diarrhea, runny nose and watering eyes. After a visit to the vet, we confirmed that he didn't have anything major wrong with him. That's when I decided to try these probiotics. Within 2 days all his symptoms were gone!! His stool firmed up to normal and his runny nose and watery eyes cleared up!
customer_reviews.author: KrystynaM

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for Your Stinky Dog 🤢
customer_reviews.text: I started my (super smelly) Sharpei on these a mere 4 days ago and these have made a world of difference in him! He was so stinky, I would have to bathe him on a weekly basis (which is terrible for his skin, but that was before I knew about probiotics for dogs.) He seriously isn’t stinky anymore, his coat is smoother, and has more energy! He has never had any bowel or gastrointestinal issues, so I don’t have much to say about that, although he’s still regular. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Having to split a capsule for a cat is a real hassle
customer_reviews.text: I like the product just fine but it's ridiculous that they say you can give half a cap to your cat per day. I thought it would be a "caplet" that I could break, but rather it's a capsule where - once you open it - you have to figure out where you're going to put the other half of the powder until the next day. Too inconvenient. They should make a cat version and spare us the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Bhramari

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Improvement in Digestion
customer_reviews.text: For most of his life, our older dog has had frequent loose stools and diarrhea, they often contained insufficiently digested food. After several days of using VetriScience probiotics his stools improved remarkably. His eliminations are easy and without stress, they appear consistent, regular and reflect a healthy digestive process. I wish we had discovered this earlier; we may have been able to prevent years of discomfort and suffering. We have been giving Jake these probiotics for about three weeks; we hope to see continued good results in the future.RP
customer_reviews.author: RAYPICK

customer_reviews.title: Suggested by my veterinarian
customer_reviews.text: This product was suggested by my veterinarian due to the fact that my little dog was on antibiotics for two weeks. It’s what she gives her daughter, I find this product works wonderfully on my dog hoping to return the good bacteria in his gut that he’s been killed by all the antibiotics. Will totally be purchasing sga this product was suggested by my veterinarian due to the fact that my little dog is on antibiotics for two weeks. It’s what she gives her daughter, I find this product works wonderfully on my dog hoping to return the good bacteria in his gut that he’s been killed by all the antibiotics. Will totally be purchasing again❤️
customer_reviews.author: lorriedragon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I used for my cat who had consent diarrhea and vomit issues and it worked to reduce those issues dramatically. After running out for a few days, both returned. Now I'm giving it to my diabetic cat (per vet's suggestion) and it has reduced her smelly, soft poos, too.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My pups bowel movements were perfect until I started her on this Probiotic. Two capsuls are recommended, I gave her just one in the evening. It started within 24 hours. When I stopped the probiotic, it went away. Just to be sure, I started her again and within 24 hours diarrhea again. Harlee never goes in the house, but during the night she went and in the morning I found 3 to 4 pile. It even continued during our morning walk. Not sure if it's this brand or she just doesn't tolerate. I read probiotics are good for dogs, but in hindsight, I figure dogs get enough microbes just being in nature.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Carlson

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old Brittany, Blue, has metastatic cancer in his lungs and has frequent "puddin" pooh. My 2 year old Field Springer, Bob, gets gas....really stinky bad gas. I had been using another brand of probiotic for Blue that I got from my vet and decided to give this brand a try since the ingredient label was almost identical to the vet's brand at half the price. I've been giving Blue one capsule sprinkled in his food twice a day, and Bob gets the same. No gas from Bob. Blue has lovely pooh after just a week on this. GREAT product that I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: dog has bad gas
customer_reviews.text: I started with the soft chew version of the probiotic, with good result. The only complain was the soft chew wasn't really soft and has a strong fermented smell. I thought the capsule version should be easier to mix with the meal. My dog has gas for a while which he didn't have before, I thought it's the add-on I have for him(cooked meat) but then realized I saw review saying their dogs have gas with this product too. I stopped the capsule and the gas stopped. Maybe it's a good product for certain dogs, just not working for us. I still like the soft chew version, the dog's fur is shinny and stool nice and firm.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched my dog from kibble to a homemade diet and she was having some trouble "staying regular" while getting used to the fresh food. It was taking her forever to go, usually only once a day, and I noticed her getting constipated and straining. I started sprinkling one of these on her dinner and she's back to normal! Loving her new diet and going twice a day with no problems, perfect stools. I'll continue to buy. Only thing, and I almost missed this- you need to refrigerate the bottle after opening! It's printed in tiny lettering on the label.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to use and deal with...
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using this with two of my cats for vomiting and diarrhea. It's so much easier than others I've tried and you need less. The other two brands I've tried worked, but there was so much of it and regardless if the company says most cats will eat it and like the taste, that's not always the case. Other brands turned the food pasty and my cats did turn away after a while, not finishing their meal. The amount of powder in a VetriScience capsule is about 1/4 of the amount needed in other probiotics. If this works I will definitely stay with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Not always a powder
customer_reviews.text: These are powder form in a capsule, so if you take the capsule apart the powder can be sprinkled onto food, which I find makes them easier to give to dogs. The last two bottles that I bought had more than a few where the powder in the capsules had solidified almost into a tablet form. I've no idea if this has any effect on the efficacy but I've decided to try other products just in case it has had a negative effect. It certainly makes using them as a powder more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! My dog has had lifelong GI issues and has to be on a probiotic. I had her on Purina Fortiflora for ages. But, the price fluctuations (and even the "low" price) was always a turn off. When I tried other options, they didn't work as well...until, I found this. Works just as well and is a fraction of the cost. Label reading and a Google search places this and one other brand alongside Fortiflora in the top three. A look at the ingredient list comparison, and the results I've had with my dog, has be convinced that this is a superior product. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JillianTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING. I have a great dane who survived parvo ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING. I have a great dane who survived parvo so we needed to get all the good stuff back in his stomach to help me digest food like he did before the horrible experience. He is doing wonderfully and this product ACTUALLY works! My chihuahua has literal "road kill " smelling breath but clean teeth and a clean diet. Her breath is changing tremendously since adding this to her food once a day. Seeing results after just two weeks. I am more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Millsm

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our Aussie
customer_reviews.text: Had switched my Australian Shepherd to weight control food. Even though food got great reviews and she liked the food, she started to have gas and loose stool. Started giving her this probiotic one capsule a day (even though she's more than 40lbs) with some peanut butter on an unsalted mini pretzel (gobbles it right up) every evening for the last several weeks. She's not gassy anymore and my husband just commented this morning that her poop is now well formed so this probiotic has worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh,PA

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!! Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s dog has had runny bowels and gas that removes paint from walls every single day for 3 years. Not a single day of normal poop in 3 years. After 4 days on this she has normal poop...we will be having a party. She hasn’t had any gas since we started it. She is a poodle mix, I open one capsule and sprinkle it over a bit of leftover rice or potato and she eats it without flinching. No more cleaning nasty runny poop that gets stuck on her fur either!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: My shepherd have a very sensitive stomach, any small changes in diet and environment can cause him to have an upset stomach.. the vet recommended adding probiotics to his daily routine, while proviable forte works great but it was expensive as a long term supplement.. this product was much more cost effective and works just as well, No more diarrhea clean ups ever since I started him on probiotics!!! After going through one bottle, I now only give him 1 capsules daily for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Helps my animals GI upsets
customer_reviews.text: I usually use FortiFlora, but due to it being so expensive I know this probiotic is just as good. It comes in these gelatin capsules and I open and sprinkle the contents on their food. TIP: I recycle the capsules for later use when I need to use it to pill my cat when I give her medication that is bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I count on Vetri-Science and am never disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although unassuming in their white bottle and without overblown claims, these canine probiotics are consistently in the top 10 products when reviewed for actual content and efficacy. Vetri-Science has long been ahead of the game when it came to non-prescription nutraceuticals. Approved by our veterinary internal medicine specialist for our dog's use.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryPoodle

customer_reviews.title: Helps my Dog’s IBD
customer_reviews.text: My 14 1/2 year old dog Maggie has suffered with IBD issues for the last several years. At one point she was on steroids and an antiobiotic medication to try to control her symptoms. I started giving her the Vetri Science Mega probiotic along with another supplement, and I was able to slowly wean Maggie off of both drugs. I just put the capsules in some peanut butter, and Maggie has no issue taking them.
customer_reviews.author: A. RoachTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Explosive runny poops!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this to my dog a few days ago. Unfortunately, he has been having explosive dihareah since day 1 of starting it. Very bummed over this. I hope his system recovers from it fast. He’s pretty miserable right now. :(
customer_reviews.author: Blorg

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The product has an awful odor. The product gave my Golden diarrhea. Emailed Vetri-Science several times about product. They never returned my email.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this since I bought it. I have not seen any improvements, and I followed all of the instructions listed on the label. 1 capsule fed to each dog, after their meal. Bottle is stored in the fridge, as per directions. Have waited for days and my dogs stomach has not improved, in fact it made their stomach worse.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are pooping much better on these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are pooping much better on these. I sprinkle it into their food since they won't ever go near a capsule. One of mine has always had loose stools and is prone to diarrhea, and since using these he's had very healthy, sturdy poops that help him express himself naturally.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two of my dogs. It seems to be working well for one dog and okay for the other. I don't have any complaints so I would say it meets expectations. One dog eats the capsules with no problem and for the other dog I pull the capsules apart and sprinkle over the top of his food and he eats that just fine so I assume this tastes somewhat good enough for them to eat without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good when taking antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and gave them to my new boxer puppy when she developed pneumonia from kennel cough. This meant repeated rounds of antibiotics which is TERRIBLE on a puppy's stomach, not to mention a horrible impediment in the potty training process! The probiotics, when given between the doses of antibiotics, help the antibiotic induced diarrhea dramatically. I put them in peanut butter and she snarfed them right down. My older dog also got a milder case of kennel cough, and also had to be put on antibiotics. I was really glad to have these on hand and started him on them right away. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cat digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: One cat has had digestive problems for years., especially liquid stools. I read that probiotics can be of some help, so started with a competitor's brand. It worked well, but the price increased significantly. Found this; got an OK from the vet. So far it's worked fine. Contra instructions, I use a full capsule (with vet's blessing) in cat's wet food; he doesn't always finish his portion or swaps bowls with the others (since the other cat always has the better food).
customer_reviews.author: Zork

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Using it while my dog is on two antibiotics but I will be keeping her on this for life! It's fantastic. And somehow it is enabling her to only have to poop twice a day instead of four times a day, I think her digestion has seriously improved. Also no more throwing up bile from not eating after starting her antibiotics. Cheap and I highly highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cinna

customer_reviews.title: Really helped our Pitbull
customer_reviews.text: We give our 70lb pit this twice a day and it's really helped his digestive issues. We really struggled to keep his weight up but adding a probiotic really helped. I like that it doesn't have all the extra stuff that the chewable versions do, our dog has tons of allergies so simplicity is key. I added it directly in with his food and he eats it no problem. It couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Zarra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT results!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how much this has helped my cat. He has had a history of loose, watery stool since he was a kitten. This is the only product I have found that has fixed this problem. Excellent probiotic!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: She looks good and is enjoying life
customer_reviews.text: This product helped my 12 year old shepherd mix tremendously. She suffers from Lyme Disease, with its many symptoms, and was having bouts of anorexia and recently was diagnosed with liver issue and renal failure. Denamarin improved the liver issues. This probiotic has improved her digestion and immune system, supported her overall health so that Azodyl has curbed the renal issues. Plus, no more anorexia or eating dirt. In addition, my dog's fur has grown back on her elbows that had become hairless and rough. Her skin color has improved. She looks good and is enjoying life.
customer_reviews.author: just a girl

customer_reviews.title: Gut health for your furry best friend
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by our vet to help aid in digestion for our goldendoodle. They can have sensitive stomachs, especially to certain foods and brands, and she said she always puts her dogs on this to aide in digestion and gut health. We noticed an improvement in stool, appetite, and overall health since starting our pup on this. Will definitely continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Big Dan88

customer_reviews.title: May still work good but will probably buy the other brand again for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the one my vet had me buy initially but these products are supposed to be OPENED and not eaten by the dog whole. these capsules are hard to open and by the end of the bottle, the contents were rock hard. May still work good but will probably buy the other brand again for easy open and easy to sprinkle on food.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: My cats will eat it and they are not vomiting
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this probiotic is that it is tasteless. The last probiotic I gave my cats had a strong flavor and they would barely touch their food. With this probiotic they don't seem to notice anything and they are eating their food. Also, they are not vomiting, which is why they are on a probiotic in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Summers

customer_reviews.title: Love this probiotic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great probiotic. My 8 year old Havanese had stomach issues of and on for years and was a very picky eater when it came to meals. We’ve tried other probiotics over the years without any change. After a serious stomach issue last spring I researched probiotics and found this one. He’s been on it daily ever since and he’s like a new dog. Eagerly waits for meals and eats every bit right away. It’s really unbelievable. Our vet credits the probiotic for this miraculous change.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

customer_reviews.title: It seems to even be working better than the other Probiotic I was using
customer_reviews.text: I just swapped out Probiotics. My Bully Mix MUST be on Probiotics or else she has some digestion issues. She doesn't generally take pills and I try to stick to powders but I figured these were capsules so I could always just break them open and dump the contents. But she will eat these whole. It seems to even be working better than the other Probiotic I was using. I plan on switching between the two to continue mixing it up for her system. But as my first time using this, I love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Meg07201126

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to try to do something for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to do something for my cat. He had become lethargic and underweight. Changing food to various types didn't help. I talked to my vet and he said it was probably hereditary, since my dog and other cat were not symptomatic. I decided to try these capsules, and the improvement was evident on the second day. He moves around more, sleeps less and doesn't vomit his food. I also started giving it to my Boxer, and he has had a tremendous decrease in frequency and strength of his farts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dogs with an Upset Stomach
customer_reviews.text: My spoo had off and on bouts of diarrhea while feeding a raw diet. These really helped her recover and stopped the diarrhea. I've also used these as a daily supplement and didn't have any issues. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: S. PatrickTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.....this is a life saver for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have a black lab, he has scratched himself raw. He was constantly scratching. I have tried so many products that haven't worked at all. I almost gave up on trying any more products but I read a review that this works so I thought I would give this a final try. I am glad I did, it really works...it started working after the 3rd dose. I will never be without it. My dog is happy and scratch free.
customer_reviews.author: JoDeeps

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I open one capsule and slip between my two small dogs once a day, have been doing it for years, this particular product seems to have good strains. I believe in giving probiotics daily but I do route between this brand and another to mix up the strains my dogs get.
customer_reviews.author: GlanzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: stopped my cat's diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrific. My 19-year-old cat started having bouts of diarrhea. I changed food, and tried other treatments, but probiotics is the way to go. She's been in control for about 6 months now. I do give her a dose every couple months just to be sure. I highly recommend probiotics as the go-to choice for pet diarrhea/loose stools.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic is great!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats seem to like the probiotic when it is mixed with their wet food. It does not have an unpleasant odor and the two cats eat all of their food and not pick at it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Green

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help  digestion...  relatively cheap too.
customer_reviews.text: I've had good luck with our Basenji using this stuff. I mix it in with a little pumpkin... some Nulo canned ..and a little Fish oil. She laps it up like she's starving.. (well she ALWAYS acts like she's starving). That concoction has her coat looking great, and since I have to pick up what she leaves in the yard everyday, I can attest her waste seems healthy as well. Believe me you can tell when it isn't healthy...
customer_reviews.author: Kafka45

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: In the morning his poop was firm but in the early evening it was soft. so far by taking this it’s so easy now to pick up his poop. Thank you VetriScience. Hope you keep the price at a reasonable rate and not raise it like the other company that I bought from.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for senior dog with soft stool
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old dog started having soft stool as he got older. Started off with Purina Fortiflora, which helped a little but stool was still soft. Once I switched to VetriScience probiotic, his stool is back to normal, solid consistently, and he no longer farts.
customer_reviews.author: Brumie

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the Tummy in Check
customer_reviews.text: After paying $15 a month for these from the vet I came here and purchased them from Vetri-Science Laboratories. These are perfect for keeping my dogs tummy in check. The great thing is, he doesn't mind them at all. Every morning I open a capsule, dissolve the powder in a very small amount of water and he drinks it right up. It's been great at keeping him from have loose bowels or throwing up. Great on the vet for diagnosis and great on Vetri-Science Laboratories for making the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ric B

customer_reviews.title: Working for colitis after bad food
customer_reviews.text: My dog was struggling with recurring colitis after a bad bag of food (fine for a few days, then mucus-y again). Adding fiber helped, but his gut needed some help getting rid of the last of the bugs. I started these probiotics, 1 capsule with meals, during an episode and saw an immediate difference. I have been able to phase out extra fiber (avoiding constipation or looseness), and will keep giving probiotics for a couple weeks and see how he does.
customer_reviews.author: fedx8Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my yorkie who has stomach and allergy issues. I sprinkle a cap full on his food every morning. He seems to have better stools and less guck in his eyes since I began using this product two months ago. I will continue ordering and using- Vetri Science has wonderful products- I am now a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: zoey

customer_reviews.title: Cleared Up Dog's Loose Stools!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this probiotic to restore my German Shepherd's gut flora after a lengthy round of antibiotics needed to clear a bacterial skin infection. The antibiotic caused my dog to have liquid stools during and after treatment. After a couple weeks on this probiotic, my dog's stools solidified nicely for easy disposal. I give him two capsules a day at each feeding. I coat the capsules in butter and administer them directly on the back of his tongue for him to swallow. He's very conditioned to this, and it's pretty easy. I highly recommend this probiotic for its proven results.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Helps Doggy Breath
customer_reviews.text: My two small dogs have been using this for about 6 weeks now. It is the only change in their diet during that time. In addition to the digestive results I expected, their breath is MUCH BETTER (practically no odor at all). I've used other probiotics over the years, but none has ever affected their breath. And since both are "kissy face," this is a welcome benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: use these for my cats
customer_reviews.text: keeps my cats from having litter box issues just mix it with their wet food and no problems
customer_reviews.author: dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: A "solid" result - I will spare you the pictures
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to take these capsules apart and sprinkle the contents on the dog's food. To be candid, I am proud of my dog's poops now. They have evolved from something you'd find at a crime scene into a neat, tidy package that is easy to pick up with a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Appraiser

customer_reviews.title: No more diarrhea!! No more vet visits!!
customer_reviews.text: My golden doodle has been having diarrhea every few months and the vet always puts him on an antibiotic. We don't know what causes it but we think he may have colitis. This last time he had diarrhea I did not take him to the vet, I had already purchased this probiotic, so I decided to see if it worked and by the next day he was better! I have continued to sprinkle it over his food in morning and evening and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable
customer_reviews.text: My Vet recommended this product when we adopted our dog. At the Vet it is $40.00 for 80, with this I get 120 for $25.00. It really helps my dogs digestion so that is definitely a plus. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Suggest You Try These
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has been taking these for almost 2 years now, since she was only a few months old. After the first couple of weeks, her bowel movements became regular, looked better, and smelled a lot less (she has always eaten high-quality, grain-free, limited-ingredient food due to skin allergies). We definitely notice a difference when we run out, and we highly recommend these to anyone with pets.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solution for my Pup's Stank Breath
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this has improved my 3 dogs' digestive health, but I can tell you that one of my dog's (~2 years old) stank breath has improved exponentially. I couldn't see anything wrong with her teeth that would cause her to have such nasty breath, so I thought maybe a probiotic might do something. Well, to my delight, her breath is sooo much better. Her nasty breath must have been the result of a bad gut. I'm just disappointed that this item is so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinestate

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would recommend to anyone! (And my dog is my baby so I'm picky)
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, being a great dane with GI issues, used to constantly develop horrible diarrhea. It remained a problem and guaranteed a minimum $100 vet bill. One of the treatments we were always given were probiotics; we decided to find ones we could give as maintenance meds to prevent his diarrhea in the first place. Two capsules a day, one in his breakfast and one in his dinner, have solved all our troubles. If his stool ever gets runny we just give him an extra capsule or two (depending on severity) and he's fine the next day. I would recommend these to anyone who wants probiotics for their pets! The quality has always been great and we've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stacy

customer_reviews.title: VetriScience Laboratories Mega Probiotic for Dogs and Cats
customer_reviews.text: We have an elderly dog with numerous medical issues on several medications. He suddenly lost his appetite and had digestive problems. I searched for how to help him, and found great reviews for this product. His appetite improved immediately after just 2 pills, his stool firmed up again and his gas is almost entirely gone. So glad I tried this probiotic for him.
customer_reviews.author: akHRprofessional

customer_reviews.title: Good probiotic for a dog with allergies
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working. My lab had to take an antibiotic & hasn't had any stomach upset while taking this probiotic too. I chose this one since she has food & environmental allergies & this has no allergens or fillers. I put my dog's veterinarian prescribed dry food in a bowl, open the capsule on top of the food & she has no problem eating it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for mom's doodle
customer_reviews.text: My mother uses this product for her goldendoodle and loves it. I tried this for my doodle and it upset his stomach. I believe this to be a quality product, but my guy is sensitive to so many things.
customer_reviews.author: family 4

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE FARTS!
customer_reviews.text: If you'd asked me a year ago what I thought about probiotics for dogs, I would've told you they were a complete waste of money. My, how my perspective has changed! My dog used to pass foul gas like clockwork, every evening while sitting right next to me on the couch. She would look at me like "What's the problem?" while I would try to get as far away from her as possible. Ever since I started sprinkling one of these on her kibble every day, there hasn't been even the faintest hint of a fart. She clearly isn't bothered by the taste - she doesn't even seem to notice. These are miracle workers!
customer_reviews.author: deal hunter

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for my dogs. My American Pitbull Terrier recently suffered from stomach issues and my Bulldog Fox Terrier just suffers from TERRIBLE gas. After getting them on a more raw diet, we noticed a big change but decided to supplement with probiotics. WELL, this is life changing. Gas no more, diarrhea no more, issues no more. Each dog takes 2 each morning with breakfast and I am a happy dog mom.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to administer to an old fussy cat.
customer_reviews.text: I had to open the caps and mix with water in properly measured amounts to administer with a string to my cat, who hated it. He is not a good eater, so I couldn't just sprinkle it in his food, not knowing wether I'd be throwing that serving out. Now I've switched to VetriScience Probiotic treats for cats and he loves those! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Guitarmox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs is on a few different meds for auto immune. These defintely seem to help treat her upset stomach. I tried another product that cost much more VetriScience is cost effective and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic for my 15lb poodle mix
customer_reviews.text: Great probiotic for my 15lb poodle mix. Vet recommended probiotic since he was a picky eater. It did give him bad diarrhea when I gave him his first dose. I waited a week so his system could clear out before re-starting him with 1/2 capsule daily x 3 days then went up to 1 capsule daily. No diarrhea issues at all now (after 1 month of use) and he isn't picky about his food anymore. Will def buy more once this bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Maple dumfries

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t eat it but my dog does. I can say it helps for us as my dog competes and gets the runs from stress/over excitement. I use this when we know we are heading to a big trial or when I can tell she is off.
customer_reviews.author: K. Laufenberg

customer_reviews.title: Have used this product for five years. Before using ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for five years. Before using it, one of my Cockers had recurring colitis flair-ups. It is rare now for him to have a flair-up since I started using these. If he shows the slightest sign of a problem, I double his dose for a week and he maintains balance. Amazon's price and the auto ship program saves me money versus purchasing these at my Vet's office. I always have an ample supply on hand for all my dogs without worry of travel to get them.
customer_reviews.author: AikenCockerMom

customer_reviews.title: Has worked wonders for my dog's gut health!
customer_reviews.text: No joke, this changed my old dog's life. He was on a downward spiral with nasty stomach issues and since we started giving him this daily he's had no issue at all. So grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Atmac

customer_reviews.title: My Great Pyrenees has been on prednisone for several months now
customer_reviews.text: My Great Pyrenees has been on prednisone for several months now, and was having gut issues. Researched probiotics for dogs and these had all the recommended strains. Falkor has noticeably improved. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: eretex

customer_reviews.title: Completely eliminated shedding & saved my family from a gassy dog. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are truly the best. I have a Rottweiler who had the absolute WORST gas and this has substantially eliminated it. I had tried switching foods, charcoal treats- you name it. Along with helping her tummy issues it has made her basically not shed, and she used to shed a lot. I can run my hands through her coat and get maybe 2 hairs and awesome perk of these probiotics. Her coat is also extremely healthy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a huge improvement the first day in both my dogs! Love this product. They have had ongoing gastro issues with very soft stools for a while. Tried changing foods and another probiotic product, but this one did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Gsp’s

customer_reviews.title: Love this probiotic
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics have done wonders for my itchy, stinky dog, his hair has started to come back after about 2 weeks on them. He no longer stinks, he has more energy because he feels better. Love these probiotics
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive stomacn going by trial and error to find what works for your dogsh
customer_reviews.text: Our lab mix has had a sensitive stomach since we adopted her more than 7 years ago. I work in the field of probitoics so I started looking for canine formulas. Vetri has always made quality products and this one is no exception. Fiona has not had any more stomach problems, except for bad reaction to comfortis, since we started her on these probiotics. Every dog/person is different and may react differently to probiotics. I would recommend reading up a bit and find what works best for your dog ( or you if you are trying human probiotics - I recommend BioGaia !)
customer_reviews.author: Toni Ann Mistretta

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to tell if products like these actually work but they seem to be doing alright. My doberman is on 30 days of antibiotics for Lyme's disease and I've been giving him this with every meal in hopes of maintaining his gut flora. we're 15 days in and his stools are pretty solid. so hey, its not hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer John

customer_reviews.title: Doctor's Prescription
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a rescue dog, who has a very sensitive digestive tract. If anything threw off her expected routine, she was getting rather serious bowl issues. After I spotted some blood, I called the doctor, who ran some tests and then recommended this. While I'm always on the look out for other issues, this has really helped my dog recover from any change in schedule without extremely loose poop. She takes one pill daily, and thinks they are treats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is too smart for pill pockets
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very sensitive tummy, these probiotic capsules help with his particular issues. I give him these once daily. I find it eaiser to sprinkle the powder in the capsule over his dry kibble. He is too smart for pill pockets. Be sure to store in fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony oliver

customer_reviews.title: dog got bad diahhrea after injesting these
customer_reviews.text: dog got bad diahhrea after injesting these, and it appears the company has poor quality control on a pill to pill basis. i'll refrain from adding a picture of said diahhrea.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bananas

customer_reviews.title: It has been an easy switch from another probiotic and so far I like ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had no problems with this product. I bought the capsules and was concerned she would not swallow them. I put it in her food and she does not even know it is there (she's small, but not discerning when it comes to eating). It has been an easy switch from another probiotic and so far I like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O

customer_reviews.title: I tract would easily get thrown off by new foods and medications
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old Pug who has struggled with G.I issues from the beginning. She constantly had runny stools and her G.I tract would easily get thrown off by new foods and medications. Our vet recommended we try a probiotic, but it was very expensive through them. I decided to look on amazon and found this product that looked promising based on all the great reviews. Sure enough, my puppies stools are nice and firm again and she’s only been taking this probiotic for 5 days now. I just coat the capsule with peanut butter and she devoures it. I’m very impressed and will buy again if it continues to work for her. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to administer
customer_reviews.text: This brand came highly recommended by my vet. This seems to be working much better than the offbrand that I was using prior to this. For my cat it's just a half dose which I mix with his wet food. As for my pup Sam I pill him with the greenies pill pocket treats and he gobbles it right up. Super easy to administer.
customer_reviews.author: Jl33NYCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: and some how the rest of the pills had hardened out of nowhere despite my storing it in a cool place at regular room temperature
customer_reviews.text: I've only used half of the bottle so far, and some how the rest of the pills had hardened out of nowhere despite my storing it in a cool place at regular room temperature.Probably a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs got very very sick from this product. Followed the dosing instructions and bigger dog didn’t eat for 2 days with gurgling stomach. Other dog got violently ill to the point that we were one more violent vomit away from rushing to the ER Vet at 2am. Do not use.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert R.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dogs healthy and regular
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it for both my pekingese (17lbs) and my golden retriever (60lbs). I had to play with the dosage a bit to get it right for them. One capsule daily for my golden, about half of one for the pekingese and we are golden. Helps to keep them regular and they are far less gassy since I started adding this to their meal. The golden I just toss the capsule in with her food, the pekingese I sprinkle it on top of it and mix it around.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: ... my two senior cats and my pug who has terrible allergies-just had for 2 days (arrived quickly-so thank you ...
customer_reviews.text: Got for my two senior cats and my pug who has terrible allergies-just had for 2 days (arrived quickly-so thank you for that)-and my very picky cat has no problem taking this (I split one pill between the cats and pour over their canned food) and my pug takes one pill (with no issues)-after two doses-he seems to be scratching less already so I'm very pleased already and I'm hopeful it will help with my cats and their digestive issues as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ker-smash18

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dogs' digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for our pups who have occasional tummy issues. Our dogs are less than 30lbs so I usually give each a half capsule with breakfast but when they are having digestive issues, I give them a whole capsule. They eat it up without issue so I assume it doesn't have a flavor. This seems to be one of the best deals on pet probiotics in regards to quantity and price. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: EKR0225

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this for almost a year now and it's really helped my dog's gut problems. The vet recommended putting him on probiotics due to an over-population on bad bacteria in his gut when he was a small puppy and this seems to work much better than the stuff they sell at the vet and costs less. I just sprinkle it on his food in the morning and night and he doesn't seem to notice it at all. No bad smell (or taste, from what I can tell by the way he still scarfs his food down!) I'm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.text: I was told to start giving my elderly dog probiotics everyday. I have repurchased this product about 8 times now. I can see the difference when she I do not give her this supplement. She’s 42lbs and I give her one everyday.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Review of Vetri-Mega probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Well, it has been two weeks since my old timer cat has been on this stuff and it seems to be helping. Have had very few runny stools and more importantly less accidents throughout the house! Whatever is in this stuff is making his system balance out better and best of all like all other reviewers-his extreme sniffer doesn't detect any medication-plus, plus, plus! I hope it continues to help him through this tough time. Ultimately, I am certain my boy has probably middle stages of stomach lymphoma... George
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Used for a while with good results
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for several months on our German shepherd, dogs known to at times have digestive issues. We had in the past a hard time keeping weight on him and having normal stools. This product has helped stabilize him. We give 2 a day in his food with no problem - so i guess it tastes ok :)
customer_reviews.author: bobcat

customer_reviews.title: Working for my dog's digestive problems
customer_reviews.text: I added this to the psyllium I give my service dog because her digestive issues leave her with unhappy anal glands. It has stretched the time between vet tech visits for her glands so I believe it is working and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LeighTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: HIVES - BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful with this product. My boxer dog broke out into hives and I only gave her 1 tablet when it called for 2.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Penn

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: My doxie girls have been on this for their whole six years. They don't mind it mixed on their food and they haven't been sick.
customer_reviews.author: Larry LaHaie

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended I try probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Listen up. My chihuahua has had bloody, mucousy stool off and on for the past year. I have spent probably $2000 on tests and vet visits, receiving the usual regimen of antibiotics and anti-nausea medication and then having the problems continue a couple of weeks later. The doctors couldn't find anything wrong with her. A friend recommended I try probiotics, so I purchased this brand after reading the reviews. We've been using it for about a month now and my dog has had normal stools, much more energy, and has a lot of pep back. I would recommend it to anyone as a dietary supplement! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: eemerson

customer_reviews.title: Helped our puppy
customer_reviews.text: Our Weimaraner puppy has a very sensitive stomach and even after we found that she was sensitive to chicken based foods and got her on a beef based she was still having loose stools. Within a week of adding the VetriScience Mega Probiotic (2x per day) her stools are normal and she was doing fine. She has now been on them for 3 months and continues to have normal, very regular bowels.
customer_reviews.author: MissesW2002

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the amount you get
customer_reviews.text: How would I know about the flavor....I'm not the one eating them .....stupid question!! They dried out very quickly
customer_reviews.author: joyce G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT .... VET QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product now for a year. I was taking my dog to the vet at least once a month for GI problems. After using this product for a month, it has almost stopped my girls GI issues.
customer_reviews.author: G. Green

customer_reviews.title: She is 11 and has constantly battled loose stools and diarrhea even with the the best foods on the market
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped out with my dog's diet. She is 11 and has constantly battled loose stools and diarrhea even with the the best foods on the market. At her last senior exam, my vet said she is doing great and said I am doing a great job looking after her health. My thoughts are this probiotic is a great supplement to her grain free diet as we have seen major improvement.
customer_reviews.author: LagunaLucy

customer_reviews.title: I am hoping this shipment is better than the last
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping this shipment is better than the last, in which about half of the capsules appeared to have been exposed to moisture and the probiotics were hard like a rock and had to be crushed by hand. I hope that being exposed to moisture did make them useless as a probiotic as I mixed the crushed power in with my cat's food to try to help her with any stomach problems she is having.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W

product_meta.title: VetriScience Laboratories - Vetri Mega Probiotic, Digestive Relief with Probiotics and Prebiotics for Dogs and Cats, Easy to Give Capsules
product_meta.description: Size:120 CountVetriScience Laboratories- Vetri Mega Probiotic, Digestive Support with Probiotics and Prebiotics for Dogs and Cats, 120 Capsules Product description (optional) : Vetri Mega Probiotic capsules provide an easy way to support your pets with digestive health issues. Our probiotic guarantees 5 billion beneficial microorganisms to the gut to assist with digestive regularity. This formula also includes Fructooligosaccharides (FOS), a soluble fiber and prebiotic which can support the growth of beneficial microorganisms that help normalize digestion and support regularity. The capsule delivery system allows for a cleaner alternative for pets that deal with allergies. The capsule can be given directly, sprinkled or hidden in another treat. Vetri Mega Probiotic also provides immune support, aids in issues related to food intolerance and, helps counteract the sometimes irritating effects of antibiotics in the digestive tract.
feature_bullets: Vetri Mega Probiotic is a non-dairy formula produced from an all-natural source of beneficial microorganisms to support digestive health
Each capsule is guaranteed to contain 5 billion microorganisms per capsule with 8 different strains from non-dairy sources
Fructooligosaccharides(FOS) or prebiotics- to support digestive tract health
Our cleanest probiotic capsule to support digestive health and issues related to food sensitivity and allergies. Capsules can easily be sprinkled, or hidden in treats
Recommended for pets that suffer regular digestive upset including flatulence, diarrhea and constipation or, pets that suffer from food intolerance's
